data.title: LibGuides at North Dakota State Library
data.meta_description: The State Library Commission, the Board of Administration, the North Dakota Legislative Assembly, the political battle between the Nonpartisan League (NPL) and the Independent Voters Association (IVA), and the book scandal of 1919.
data.text:
Search this Guide

Exhibit - "Book Scandal of 1919": Timeline

The State Library Commission, the Board of Administration, the North Dakota Legislative Assembly, the political battle between the Nonpartisan League (NPL) and the Independent Voters Association (IVA), and the book scandal of 1919.

Many of these resources and programs are funded under the provisions of the Library Services and Technology Act from the Institute of Museum and Library Services.
